## Page class

Represents the data of a Page: an artifact in the Publication's target structure.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Page extends VersionedItem
```

**Extends:** [VersionedItem](./models.versioneditem.md)

The file name is subject to the restrictions of the Windows file system. The file name does not include the file extension. The file extension is determined by the Page Template: "fileExtension".</p> |
